section.title: 私有 registry
section.screen: kubectl create deployment registry --image=registry:latest kubectl expose deployment registry --port=5000 --target-port=30500 --type=NodePort kubectl delete -n default deployment registry kubectl delete -n default pod registry

section.title: mongodb
section.screen: kubectl run mongodb --image=docker.io/mongo --env="p='27017:27017'" --env="v='/opt/mongodb:/data'" kubectl expose deployment mongodb --port=27017 --target-port=27017
